title: Github pages + Hexo搭建个人博客
text: 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243#include <iostream>#include <string>using namespace std;int main(){ int n; cin>>n; while(n--){ string s1,s2=""; cin>>s1; for(int i=0;i<s1.length();i++){ switch(s1[i]){ case '0':s2+="0000";break; case '1':s2+="0001";break; case '2':s2+="0010";break; case '3':s2+="0011";break; case '4':s2+="0100";break; case '5':s2+="0101";break; case '6':s2+="0110";break; case '7':s2+="0111";break; case '8':s2+="1000";break; case '9':s2+="1001";break; case 'A':s2+="1010";break; case 'B':s2+="1011";break; case 'C':s2+="1100";break; case 'D':s2+="1101";break; case 'E':s2+="1110";break; case 'F':s2+="1111";break; default:break; } } int len=s2.length(); if(len%3==1) s2="00"+s2; else if(len%3==2) s2="0"+s2; int flag=0; for(int i=0;i<=s2.length()-3;i=i+3){ int r=4*(s2[i]-'0')+2*(s2[i+1]-'0')+s2[i+2]-'0'; if(r) flag=1; if(flag) cout<<r; } cout<<endl; } return 0;} 哈哈哈哈哈
